item.description:
*Weather permitting, this is a combo event! Volunteering on an animal sanctuary for a couple of hours and then eating a nice big picnic lunch together afterwards. This is a "Bring your own food" event, and there will be no way to keep food warm unless you can find a way to yourself. If you can''t set aside that much time, you can always come for one part or the other. But you'll love my favorite wooly friends, the close-talkers! ;)

CARPOOLING IS AVAILABLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The place: Maple Farm Sanctuary *See the bottom of this section for the rain location!

The time: Work begins at 11 - Lunch begins at 1 (Times are approx)

Maple Farm Sanctuary is a safe and loving refuge for farmed animals given a
second chance at life.

Located on a 121 acre farm in Mendon, MA, the sanctuary is home to cows, pigs,
chickens, goats, llamas, horses and many other individuals who had once endured
miserable lives of fear and suffering.

Now, they live the remainder of their lives in peace, free to roam and
meander among the land to share with our human and non-human family.


*Rain Location to be announced!

As always, email me with any questions!!!
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp May Meetup
